code_value: Questions 1~2  Your friend has lost his way in the city center and he has phoned you for help. Ask your friend two questions about it. </br>Questions 3~4  You have a toothache and you are seeing the doctor now. Ask the doctor two questions.
Questions 1~2  Your friend has lost his way in the city center and he has phoned you for help. Ask your friend two questions about it.
Questions 3~4  You have a toothache and you are seeing the doctor now. Ask the doctor two questions.
